data:
This tower features a soldier who uses a sniper rifle to take down targets from a great distance.
It has the longest range but the slowest rate of fire.
The sniper is effective against both ground and flying enemies.
The sniper shots inflict 22% more damage.
The sniper shots inflict 44% more damage.
The sniper can fire two bullets simultaneously.
The sniper shots inflict 150% more damage, capable of destroying some enemies with one shot.
